name: No Fought with the Goblins
description:
Fight hordes of Trollcops, Why? I don't know, Chat voted on it.

The Game is less than 5 minutes long

Controls:
Z X C V ------ Actions
Arrow Keys - Move
Enter/P/Esc - Pause
R ------------ Reset (When Paused)

Left Arrow Key / Backspace - Previous Comic
